    • Method Detail

      • checkStock

        public int checkStock(int currentStock,
             int ordered,
             int maxStock)
               throws ArgumentConstraintException
        Description copied from interface: OrderPlacer
        This class calculates the amount of items needed for the given state of the stock
        Specified by:
        checkStock in interface OrderPlacer
        Parameters:
        currentStock - how much space is left in the stock
        ordered - how many items are already ordered
        maxStock - the max amount of items the stock can hold
        Returns:
        The number of items that needs to be ordered.
        Throws:
        ArgumentConstraintException - currentStock<0
        See Also:
        OrderPlacer.checkStock(int, int, int)
